Sequence Information.Target Organism: No MICs found in DRAMP database
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Thionins are small plant proteins which are toxic to animal cells. They seem to exert their toxic effect at the level of the cell membrane.

Literature.Title: Refinement of purothionins reveals solute particles important for lattice formation and toxicity. Part 2 structure of beta-purothionin at 1.7 A resolution.

Literature.Author: Stec B, Rao U, Teeter MM.
